00009   Sass_Value* String::construct(const std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> raw_val, Sass_Value **out) {
00010     char const* value = "";
00011 
00012     if (raw_val.size() >= 1) {
00013       if (!raw_val[0]->IsString()) {
00014         return fail("Argument should be a string.", out);
00015       }
00016 
00017       value = create_string(raw_val[0]);
00018     }
00019 
00020     return *out = sass_make_string(value);
00021   }

00025     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setValue", SetValue);

00028   NAN_METHOD(String::GetValue) {
00029     info.GetReturnValue().Set(Nan::New<v8::String>(sass_string_get_value(unwrap(info.This())->value)).ToLocalChecked());
00030   }
00031 
00032   NAN_METHOD(String::SetValue) {
00033     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00034       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00035     }
00036 
00037     if (!info[0]->IsString()) {
00038       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a string").ToLocalChecked());
00039     }
00040 
00041     sass_string_set_value(unwrap(info.This())->value, create_string(info[0]));
00042   }
